title: Aleksandr Budakov
text:
Aleksandr Vladimirovich Budakov (; born 10 February 1985) is a Russian former professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a> in 2006 for <a href="FC%20Chernomorets%20Novorossiysk">FC Chernomorets Novorossiysk</a>.
Match fixing.
In August 2016, Budakov was one of several <a href="FC%20Isloch%20Minsk%20Raion">Isloch Minsk Raion</a> players alleged to be involved in <a href="Match%20fixing%20in%20association%20football">match fixing</a> during their match with <a href="FC%20Dinamo%20Brest">Dinamo Brest</a> on 30 April 2016.
